name: Offroad Car: Driving Simulator
description:
Offroad Car: Driving Simulator is for those who like to drive speedy and fast Prado on rough surface. Drive your offroad mountain hill climb 4x4 jeep driving 3d in high mountains and on sandy track of landscape in beautiful mountain environment. Download and play the big wheel offroad mountain climb monster jeep and drive it on the turbo real drift impossible jeep racing track. Drive on the sharp turns high mountain tracks of the landscape areas to show your driving skills. Do not fall off from the high mountains paths. Smooth and real controls will give you the chance to increase your crazy 4x4 offroad suv prado hill driving skills.

Features:
- Eye catching beautiful game graphics and background.
- Awesome sound effects and visual effects.
- Enjoy the absolutly free of cost game.
- Real animation and 3D gameplay and graphics.
- All age group supported game (male or female), kids, teenagers and adults.
- Easy and Fun to play.
- High Quality Graphics
